Week.Meening: Whiz means 'move very fast.' Some things that whiz make a buzzing or hissing sound.
Squirm means 'wiggle or twist your body from side to side, usually because you are bored or uncomfortable.'
Rap means 'tap or hit something sharply (forcefully) and quickly' rap is also a 'type of music in which words are spoken in time to music which a steady beat.'
When something is likely, it probably will happen or is probably true.
Unlikely means 'not likely.' When something is likely, it probably will not happen or is probably not true.
Volunteer means 'offer to do something or help someone by choice.' When you volunteer, you do something because you want to do it. You do not expect pay or a reward.
Bustle mean 'rush or hurry in an excited. noisy, or busy way.'
Debris is the 'scattered pieces of something that has been thrown away, broken, or destroyed.'
Ruckus mean 'noisy confusion or excitement.' Something unexpected or frightening can cause a ruckus.
Lounge means 'sit or lie in a lazy or relaxed way.'
